Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given prompt. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Prompt: OLA BOM DIA

"Olá bom dia" is a common phrase in Portuguese, which translates to "Hello good morning" in English.

[[1](https://www.linguee.com/portuguese-english/translation/ol%C3%A1+bom+dia!.html)] In the first search result, "olá bom dia" is being used as a greeting and is followed by a sentence stating that something is good, but it is not Christmas Day.
[[2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ji7tE69vR1s)] The second search result is a video that teaches a song with the lyrics "bom dia" (good morning) and encourages people to sing and make gestures with friends in different places and situations.
[[3](https://mymemory.translated.net/en/Portuguese/English/ola%2C-bom-dia)] The third search result is an online translation service that provides "good morning" as the translation for "ola bom dia" and also provides an example where it is added as a compliment to a woman "ola bom dia moça bonita" which means "hello good morning beautiful lady".

Prompt: PODE ME SUGERIR NONE DE LOJA PARA SHOPEE

It seems that the topic of naming a store on Shopee is a common one, as all three provided search results discuss this topic.
[[1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cEPCRFiIl-A)] In the first search result, the video mentions that it is now possible to change a store's name on Shopee, and provides a link to a tutorial on how to do this.
[[2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8jXEKSrsIMs)] The second search result is a video that discusses the importance of having a good name for your Shopee store and gives some tips for choosing a name.
[[3](https://businessnamegenerator.com/pt-br/gerador-de-nomes-para-lojas/)] The third search results is a website that provides a name generator for online stores, it will be helpful to generate some options of store name.

As per your requirement, I would suggest you to use the third search result, it's a website that provides a name generator for online stores.
Also, you can use the tips mentioned in the second search result, it will help you to choose a good and meaningful name for your store.

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given prompt. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Prompt: FALA PORTUGUES

"Fala portugués" is a phrase in Spanish that translates to "speak Portuguese" in English.

[[1](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fala-portugu%C3%A9s/id1574183280)] In the first search result, it refers to an app called "Fala portugués" which is a Portuguese learning app that provides a variety of content to help users learn the language in an easy and effective way, from basic to advanced level.
[[2](https://falaportugues.ro/)] The second search result is a website that provides resources and courses to learn the Portuguese language. It offers newsletter and alert service to stay updated with language learning news and upcoming courses.
[[3](https://www.wordhippo.com/what-is/the-meaning-of/portuguese-word-a752d6baccaffdaa2178d11679c5ab137b242097.html)] The third search result is a website that provides the meaning of "fala" which is a verb that means "speak out" or "speak up" and "speechmaker" .

It seems that "Fala portugués" is related to learning Portuguese language, the first search result refers to an app and the second one is a website that provides resources and courses for it, and the third one refers to the verb "fala" which means to "speak".
